actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the establishment of the Select Committee on the Role of the United States in the United Nations.

summary.text: Establishes in the House of Representatives the Select Committee on the Role of the United States in the United Nations. Requires the Committee to conduct an investigation of the benefits and burdens accruing to the United States as the result of its membership and participation in the United Nations.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the establishment of the Select Committee on the Role of the United States in the United Nations.
